hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #an Odd Mushroom#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #stable#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Eyedrops#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #House of Skulltula#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Claim Check# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Cojiro# and #the Prelude of Light#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Why won't anyone acknowledge the housing crisis in Kakariko Village?
